title: Simon & Simon S02E01/Magnum PI Crossover Emeralds Are Not a Girl
description:
This is a Crossover Episode from the Magnum P.I. Season 1 Bonus Disc.  This episode is Part 2 of a two-part series; Part 1 is the Magnum P.I. episode S03E03 Ki&#039;l&#039;s Don&#039;t Lie.

Simon & Simon (1981)
S02E01 Emeralds Are Not a Girl&#039;s Best Friend (2)
First aired: 10/5/1982
Rick and A.J. are in Hawaii tailing a con artist who Higgins has just entrusted with $350,000, proceeds from his charity event. With the help of Thomas Magnum, Rick and A.J. follow her to South America where they reel her in with a con of their own, using a huge emerald and A.J. as bait.  Tom Selleck, Morgan Fairchild, Joe Mantegna guest star.

Cast: Gerald McRaney as Rick Simon, Jameson Parker as A.J. Simon
 
Guest cast: Tom Selleck (Thomas Magnum), Morgan Fairchild (Catherine Hailey/Alex Houston), Joe Mantegna (Henry), Robert Madrid (Policeman), J.P. Bumstead (FBI Man), Panchito Gomez (Manuel), Eduardo Ricard (El Presidente Ramon), Tony Acierto (Guerilla), Ashley Hester (Catherine Lookalike), John Hillerman (Jonathan Higgins), Jeannie Wilson, Mary Carver, Eddie Barth (Myron Fowler)
